overview:
Faidi Law Firm is one of the leading law firms in Jordan, was established in 1995 by the Advocate Ahmad Faidi, F.L.F is a full service law firm and submits legal services in arbitration, banking, construction, foreign investment, privatization, corporate structuring, intellectual property, financing agreements, litigation, international business transactions, patents and trademarks, shipping, insurance, taxation, agency, distribution, franchising, and contracts in general. The firm has broadly based practice with an excellent reputation for offering a full range of quality legal services. Large enough to handle complex cases, yet small enough to maintain a close personal relationship with clients. In addition for the legislation field which the law firm specialize in the legislation is included making laws, regulations, and memorandum of understanding for public and private sectors. The firm is well suited to represent local clients as well as international individuals and corporations. Our success has been achieved through competent representation, high ethical standards and open cordial relations with clients’ government personnel and the legal community. Whether dealing with a small matter on behalf of an individual or a multi-million dollar project for a major corporation, we offer innovative, cost-effective services on a distinctly personal basis. We are committed to achieving a successful outcome for our clients in a cost efficient manner. Our attorneys are accomplished advocates who pay close attention to our clients’ needs and work aggressively to achieve their goals. We aim to distinguish ourselves through the quality of our legal advice and service, our capacity for innovation, and ability to assist our clients to achieve their objectives. The firm has developed a reputation for a high quality work in corporate, commercial and business law areas, and legislation.

Areas of Practice:-
-Civil Law -Arbitration -Mediation -Real Estate -Labor Law -Legislation -Intellectual Property -Commercial Law -Companies Law -Criminal Law -Banking and Finance -Mergers and Acquisitions -Litigation (at all levels of court) -Insurance Law -Personal Injuries -Tax & Customs -Investment Law -Constructions Law Administrative Law- Contracts & Agreements General legal services Contact us!
